officialTitle: User Trial on the Use in Common Practice of a New Electronic Auto-injector of Saizen®, the E-Device (Electronic Device), in Children Treated by Recombinant Human Growth Hormone Over a Period of 2 Months
summary: The aim of the study is to evaluate the E-Device performances and handling on the use in common practice, by collecting the impressions of patients, nurses and the investigator on the graphic interface, the instructions manual, the E-Device training and the material itself.

primaryOutcome.measure: Subjects' Overall Impression After Using E-Device
